imm_ptl.generating_new_frame: Impossible de trouver le portail existant. Générer d'un nouveau portail
imm_ptl.laggy: Rendu des portails moindres pour ne pas causer de lag (cela peut-être désactivé dans le fichier de configuration)
imm_ptl.clear_border_warning:
Attention ! Cela effacera tous les blocs de la couche extérieure de la bordure du monde.
Cette opération ne peut pas être annulée. Vous devriez sauvegarder le monde avant de le faire.
 Cette opération générera les tronçons le long de la frontière qui peuvent augmenter la taille de monde de %1$s Go.
Utilisez à nouveau cette commande pour continuer.
imm_ptl.not_in_wrapping_zone: Vous n'êtes dans aucune zone de recouvrement
imm_ptl.finished_clearing_border: Finished Clearing Border. The blocks updates are not synchronized to the client. Re-enter the world to check.
imm_ptl.needs_pehkui: Votre échelle n'est pas modifiée car Pehkui n'est pas installé.
imm_ptl.dim_stack_initialized: [Immersive Portals] Les piles du monde ont été initialisé
imm_ptl.inform_wiki: [Immersive Portals] Consultez le wiki pour savoir comment personnaliser les portails
imm_ptl.portal_helper_tooltip: Construire deux cadres de portail, utiliser du silex et de l'acier pour l'allumer
imm_ptl.incompatible_shape: [Immersive Portals] Cannot convert the conventional portal because the shapes are incompatible.
imm_ptl.enable_nether_portal_overlay: Activer l'overlay du portail du Nether
imm_ptl.stagnate_movement: L'autre côté du portail n'est pas encore chargé
imm_ptl.memory_not_enough: [Immersive Portals] Memory seems not enough. If you experience GC lag, try to shrink render distance or allocate more memory. How to allocate more memory:
imm_ptl.command_desc.delete_portal: Delete the one-way one-faced portal component
imm_ptl.command.remove_connected_portals: Make the portal one-way and one-faced
imm_ptl.command.complete_bi_way_bi_faced: Make the portal bi-way and bi-faced
imm_ptl.command_desc.bind_cluster: Allow Easy Editing of Bi-way Bi-faced Portal
imm_ptl.command_desc.move_portal_front: Along the direction that you are looking at
imm_ptl.command_desc.move_portal_back: Along the direction that you are looking at
imm_ptl.command_desc.move_portal_destina: Along the direction that you are looking at
Along the direction that you are looking at
imm_ptl.command_desc.enable_pos_adjust: Avoid falling through floor after teleportation
imm_ptl.command.disable_rendering_yourse: Make the portal to not render yourself
imm_ptl.command_desc.goback: Return to the last entered portal
imm_ptl.command_desc.sculpt: Sculpts the portal shape by the blocks that it's intersecting with
imm_ptl.command_desc.reset_shape: Resets the portal shape to the default rectangular shape
imm_ptl.about_lag: [Immersive Portals] Portals abruptly load many chunks and may cause lag spikes. The lag will probably disappear after playing for 1 or 2 minutes.
imm_ptl.portal_helper_not_linked: No compatible portal helper frame can be found nearby. A new frame has been generated. It can only link to a frame with compatible shape. 1x3 can link to 2x6, but 1x2 cannot link to 2x5. It can only link to a frame nearby. The shape cannot be wider than 20 blocks. If you want it to link to a far place, use commands.
imm_ptl.preview_warning: You are using a preview version of Immersive Portals mod which is not yet stable. Report issues:
imm_ptl.dim_stack_established: Dimension stack has been setup. (Existing chunks will remain unchanged)
imm_ptl.dim_stack_removed: Dimension stack has been removed. (Existing chunks will remain unchanged)
imm_ptl.cannot_connect_to_vanilla_portal: [Immersive Portals] Note: The immersive nether portal won't connect to an existing vanilla nether portal. It can only link to an empty obsidian frame with the same shape and orientation.
imm_ptl.fabulous_warning: [Immersive Portals] With Immersive Portals installed, when graphic mode is "fabulous", the transparency rendering may be broken in some hardware. It's not recommended to use "fabulous" mode. And shaders make the game more fabulous than the vanilla "fabulous" mode.
imm_ptl.intel_warning: [Immersive Portals] You are using Intel videocard. GUI rendering may be abnormal. The issue is still under investigation.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.immersive: See through portals and teleport seamlessly.
imm_ptl.missing_gravity_changer: Gravity Changer mod is not present. Your gravity direction is not changed
imm_ptl.sodium_warning: [Immersive Portals] You are using Sodium with Immersive Portals. The compatibility is not perfect. Rendering issues may occur.
imm_ptl.iris_warning: [Immersive Portals] You are using Iris with Immersive Portals. Portal rendering mostly works with most shaders, but there may be some rendering artifacts. If there are blurring when looking at a portal, turn off "TAA" and "Motion Blur".
imm_ptl.new_version_available: A new version of Immersive Portals mod is available: %s. It's recommended to use the new version. Download:
imm_ptl.severely_incompatible: WARNING: Immersive Portals mod is incompatible with mod %1$s(%2$s). Major issues will occur. You should uninstall one of the two mods. (If the two mods become compatible now, report it to qouteall.)
imm_ptl.severely_incompatible_within_ver: WARNING: Immersive Portals mod is incompatible with mod %1$s(%2$s) version %3$s. Major issues will occur. You should install another version of %1$s
imm_ptl.incompatible: WARNING: Immersive Portals mod maybe has compatibility issues with mod %1$s(%2$s). If you are sure that two mods become compatible again, report to qouteall.
imm_ptl.no_place_to_generate_portal: Cannot find space to place the other-side portal. Try lighting a smaller portal.
imm_ptl.sculpted: Portal Sculpted. Area Reduced: %s  Area Before: %s  Area After: %s
imm_ptl.nvidia_warning: [Immersive Portals] You are using Nvidia videocard. The game may crash because of a Nvidia driver bug. It's recommended to install Sodium to workaround this issue. Details:
text.autoconfig.immersive_portals.title: Immersive Portals Config
text.autoconfig.immersive_portals.option: Cross Portal Entity Rendering (Not enabled with Iris)
Enable Nether Portal Sound and Particle
imm_ptl.conflicting_dim_stack: Cannot set dimension stack because of portal conflicts
imm_ptl.conflicting_dim_stack_detail:
The red arrows indicate conflicting portals. There cannot be two portals in the floor or ceiling of a dimension.
To fix that, you can remove entries or disable a specific connection.
imm_ptl.incompatible_shaderpack: [Immersive Portals] Le shaderpack actuellement utilisé est incompatble avec Immersive Portals. Le rendu des portails peut être cassé. Si vous voulez un meilleur rendu des portails, essayé un autre shaderpack.
imm_ptl.portal_helper_deprecated: Portal Helper is now deprecated. It's recommended to use portal wand. Portal wand is easier to use and more powerful. It's recommended to use command %s to edit portal shape.
imm_ptl.wand.first_side_left_bottom: Use %s to select the left bottom point of the portal
imm_ptl.wand.first_side_left_up:
Select the left top point
(width: %1$s, height: %2$s)
imm_ptl.wand.second_side_left_bottom: Select the left bottom point of the second side of the portal
imm_ptl.wand.second_side_right_bottom:
Select the right bottom point of the second side
(width: %1$s, height: %2$s, scale: %3$s)
imm_ptl.wand.second_side_left_up: Select the left top point of the second side
imm_ptl.wand.pre_drag:
Use %s to lock/unlock point on portal
Use %s to drag portal %s
imm_ptl.wand.lock_cleared: The portal lock(s) have been cleared because pointing to another portal.
imm_ptl.wand.overlap: The two side overlaps. Only generates one-way one-faced portal.
imm_ptl.wand.copy.not_copying_cluster: Only copied one-face one-way portal to avoid interference. Use command '/portal complete_bi_way_bi_faced_portal' to make it bi-faced and bi-way.
imm_ptl.wand.copy.prompt.copy_or_cut: Use %s to copy portal. Use %s to cut portal
imm_ptl.wand.copy.prompt.place_portal:
Use %s to place portal
Use %s to discard the portal
imm_ptl.wand.settings_2: Press %s to free the mouse to click them.
imm_ptl.quilt_warning: You are using Immersive Portals mod on Quilt. The Fabric version of Immersive Portals mod is designed for Fabric and may malfunction on Quilt.
imm_ptl.mod_patch_version_mismatch: The server's Immersive Portals mod version (%s) does not match the client's (%s). It's recommended to upgrade both client and server's Immersive Portals mod to latest.
imm_ptl.mod_major_minor_version_mismatch:
The server's Immersive Portals mod version (%s) is incompatible with client's Immersive Portals mod version (%s).
It's recommended to upgrade both client and server's Immersive Portals mod to the latest version.
If you want to connect without using another version of Immersive Portals, turn on 'Tolerant version mismatch with server' in the mod settings (you need to install Mod Menu to access the settings).
imm_ptl.server_missing_immptl: Vous vous êtes connecté à un serveur qui n'installe pas le mod Immersive Portals. Le mod Immersive Portals est conçu pour fonctionner avec le serveur qui l'installe. Toutes les fonctionnalités de Immersive Portals ne fonctionneront pas ici. D'autres problèmes peuvent survenir. Il est recommandé de se connecter à ce serveur sans Immersive Portals.
